channel.title: Anyone have any good login box's for delta?
channel.description: I'm sorta tired of using a random resize picture off of google images and would like just a clean login box...I'm looking for a login box that has feel of this one [img]https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRjKW65vtVsQxioaf4p45mAenwkJ0KurX1i7VbGV4zNn_89Hp58[/img] yet would just like the blank background of it..without the username text exc, but would like see some piture of your guys login box heres what I'm using right now as my login box...I know its pretty bad [img]https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTODn8-gyPUypG-b2Wa_UX5-TAAQ_D4m6ndpNQy5A_Bum1FcNcDtw[/img]

item.title: Anyone have any good login box's for delta?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“kicker862, post:2, topic:466010”]I wanted to make my login box transparent so it just lays on the background. But when I made it transparent it would just continuously show the loadin bar and then none of the text on the login box would disappear so that all over lapped. So I just used a picture of light rays instead.

I’m on my phone so I can’t upload it. Here’s the link though.

http://imgs.mi9.com/uploads/abstract/4147/abstract-blue-backgrounds-27_1920x1200_71450.jpg[/quote]
looks nice

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone have any good login box's for delta?
